members.name: ambientlightVS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 0) in vec3 vPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 1) in vec2 vUV;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    out vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    out vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        fPosition_s = vec4( vPosition_s, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        gl_Position = fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a        fUV = vUV;\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: ambientlightFS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    struct AmbientLight\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        vec3 color;\x0d\x0a    };\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    in vec4 fPosition;\x0d\x0a    in vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // this diffuse should be set to the geometry output\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D diffuseTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform AmbientLight light;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9222217/how-does-the-fragment-shader-know-what-variable-to-use-for-the-color-of-a-pixel\x0d\x0a    out vec4 color;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        color = vec4( light.color * texture( diffuseTexture, fUV ).xyz, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: geometryVS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 0) in vec3 vPosition_m;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 1) in vec2 vUV;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 2) in vec3 vNormal_m;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 3) in vec3 vTangent_m;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    out vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    out vec3 fNormal_v;\x0d\x0a    out vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a    out vec3 fTangent_v;\x0d\x0a    flat out uint fObjectId;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 worldView;\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 worldViewProj;\x0d\x0a    uniform uint objectId;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        // gl_Position is like SV_Position\x0d\x0a        fPosition_s = worldViewProj * vec4( vPosition_m, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        gl_Position = fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a        fUV = vUV;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        fNormal_v = ( worldView * vec4( vNormal_m, 0.0f ) ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        fTangent_v =  ( worldView * vec4( vTangent_m, 0.0f ) ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        fObjectId = objectId;\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: geometryFS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    in vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    in vec3 fNormal_v;\x0d\x0a    in vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a    in vec3 fTangent_v;\x0d\x0a    flat in uint fObjectId;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    layout( location = 0 ) out vec4 color;\x0d\x0a    layout( location = 1 ) out vec4 normal_v;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D diffuseTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D normalTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D specularTexture;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    vec2 encode( vec3 normal )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        float t = sqrt( 2 / ( 1 - normal.z ) );\x0d\x0a        return normal.xy * t;\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    vec3 calculateMappedNormal()\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        vec3 normal = normalize( fNormal_v );\x0d\x0a        vec3 tangent = normalize( fTangent_v );\x0d\x0a        //Use Gramm-Schmidt process to orthogonalize the two\x0d\x0a        tangent = normalize( tangent - dot( tangent, normal ) * normal );\x0d\x0a        vec3 bitangent = -cross( tangent, normal );\x0d\x0a        vec3 normalMap = ((texture( normalTexture, fUV ).xyz) * 2) - 1;\x0d\x0a        mat3 TBN = mat3( tangent, bitangent, normal );\x0d\x0a        return normalize( TBN * normalMap );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        color = texture( diffuseTexture, fUV );\x0d\x0a        // specular intensity\x0d\x0a        vec3 specularSample = texture( specularTexture, fUV ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        color.w = ( specularSample.x + specularSample.y + specularSample.z ) / 3;\x0d\x0a        normal_v = vec4( calculateMappedNormal(), float(fObjectId) );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: directionallightVS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 0) in vec3 vPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 1) in vec2 vUV;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 invProj;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    out vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    out vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a    out vec3 fViewRay;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        fPosition_s = vec4( vPosition_s, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        gl_Position = fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        vec3 position_v = ( invProj * vec4( vPosition_s, 1.0f ) ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        // This is the ray clamped to depth 1, and it'll just be moved & interpolated in the XY\x0d\x0a        fViewRay = vec3( position_v.xy / position_v.z, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        fUV = vUV;\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: directionallightFS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    struct DirectionalLight\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        vec3 color;\x0d\x0a        vec3 direction;\x0d\x0a        float shadowless;\x0d\x0a    };\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    in vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    in vec2 fUV;\x0d\x0a    in vec3 fViewRay;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // g-buffer outputs\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D diffuseTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D normalTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D depthTexture;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // shadow map values\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D shadowMap;\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 lightProjView;\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 cameraView;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    uniform DirectionalLight light;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // A pair of constants for reconstructing the linear Z\x0d\x0a    // [ (-Far * Near ) / ( Far - Near ),  Far / ( Far - Near )  ]\x0d\x0a    uniform vec2 projectionConstants;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9222217/how-does-the-fragment-shader-know-what-variable-to-use-for-the-color-of-a-pixel\x0d\x0a    layout( location = 0 ) out vec4 color;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // Function for decoding normals\x0d\x0a    vec3 decode( vec2 enc )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        float t = ( ( enc.x * enc.x ) + ( enc.y * enc.y ) ) / 4;\x0d\x0a        float ti = sqrt( 1 - t );\x0d\x0a        return vec3( ti * enc.x, ti * enc.y, -1 + t * 2 );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    float shadowValue(vec3 pos)\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        mat4 toShadowMap_s = lightProjView * inverse(cameraView);\x0d\x0a        vec4 lightSpacePos = toShadowMap_s * vec4( pos, 1 );\x0d\x0a        lightSpacePos = lightSpacePos / lightSpacePos.w;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        vec2 shadowCoords = (lightSpacePos.xy * 0.5) + vec2( 0.5, 0.5 );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        float depthValue = texture( shadowMap, shadowCoords ).x -  0.0001;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        return float( (lightSpacePos.z * .5 + .5 ) < depthValue );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        vec3 textureColor = texture( diffuseTexture, fUV ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        float specularIntensity = texture( diffuseTexture, fUV ).w;\x0d\x0a        vec3 normal_v = texture( normalTexture, fUV ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        vec3 lightDir_v = -normalize( light.direction );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Reconstruct position from Depth\x0d\x0a        float depth = texture( depthTexture, fUV ).x;\x0d\x0a        float linearDepth = projectionConstants.x / ( projectionConstants.y - depth );\x0d\x0a        vec3 position_v = fViewRay * linearDepth;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Diffuse lighting calculations\x0d\x0a        float diffuseScale = clamp( dot( normal_v, lightDir_v ), 0, 1 );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Specular lighting calculations\x0d\x0a        // Usually in these you see an \"eyeDirection\" variable, but in view space that is our position\x0d\x0a        float specularScale = clamp( dot( normalize( position_v ), reflect( lightDir_v, normal_v ) ), 0, 1 );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        vec3 diffuse = ( diffuseScale * light.color ) * textureColor;\x0d\x0a        // \"8\" is the reflectiveness\x0d\x0a        // textureColor.w is the shininess\x0d\x0a        // specularIntensity is the light's contribution\x0d\x0a        vec3 specular = ( pow( specularScale, 8 ) * light.color * specularIntensity);\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        color = vec4( ( diffuse + specular ), 1.0f );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: pointlightVS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 0) in vec3 vPosition_m;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 1) in vec2 vUV;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 2) in vec3 vNormal_m;\x0d\x0a    layout(location = 3) in vec3 vTangent_m;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    out vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    out vec3 fViewRay;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    //uniform mat4 world;\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 worldView;\x0d\x0a    uniform mat4 worldViewProj;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        // gl_Position is like SV_Position\x0d\x0a        fPosition_s = worldViewProj * vec4( vPosition_m, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        gl_Position = fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        fViewRay = ( worldView * vec4( vPosition_m, 1.0 ) ).xyz;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: pointlightFS
members.init: "#version 400\x0a\x0d\x0a    struct PointLight{\x0d\x0a        vec3 pos_v;\x0d\x0a        vec3 color;\x0d\x0a        float radius;\x0d\x0a        float falloffRate;\x0d\x0a    };\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    in vec4 fPosition_s;\x0d\x0a    in vec3 fViewRay;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    out vec4 color;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D diffuseTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D normalTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform sampler2D depthTexture;\x0d\x0a    uniform PointLight light;\x0d\x0a    // A pair of constants for reconstructing the linear Z\x0d\x0a    // [ (-Far * Near ) / ( Far - Near ),  Far / ( Far - Near )  ]\x0d\x0a    uniform vec2 projectionConstants;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    // Function for decoding normals\x0d\x0a    vec3 decode( vec2 enc )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        float t = ( ( enc.x * enc.x ) + ( enc.y * enc.y ) ) / 4;\x0d\x0a        float ti = sqrt( 1 - t );\x0d\x0a        return vec3( ti * enc.x, ti * enc.y, -1 + t * 2 );\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    void main( void )\x0d\x0a    {\x0d\x0a        // The viewray should have interpolated across the pixels covered by the light, so we should just be able to clamp it's depth to 1\x0d\x0a        vec3 viewRay = vec3( fViewRay.xy / fViewRay.z, 1.0f );\x0d\x0a        vec2 UV = ( ( fPosition_s.xy / fPosition_s.w ) + 1 ) / 2;\x0d\x0a        vec3 textureColor = texture( diffuseTexture, UV ).xyz;\x0d\x0a        float specularIntensity = texture( diffuseTexture, UV ).w;\x0d\x0a        vec3 normal_v = texture( normalTexture, UV ).xyz;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Reconstruct position from depth\x0d\x0a        float depth = texture( depthTexture, UV ).x;\x0d\x0a        float linearDepth = projectionConstants.x / ( projectionConstants.y - depth );\x0d\x0a        vec3 position_v = viewRay * linearDepth;\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // calculate normalized light direction, and distance\x0d\x0a        vec3 lightDir_v = light.pos_v - position_v;\x0d\x0a        float distance = sqrt( dot(lightDir_v,lightDir_v) );\x0d\x0a        lightDir_v = normalize( lightDir_v );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // calculate exponential attenuation\x0d\x0a        float attenuation = pow( max( 1-distance/light.radius, 0), light.falloffRate + 1.0f );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Diffuse lighting calculations\x0d\x0a        float diffuseScale = clamp( dot( normal_v, lightDir_v ), 0, 1 );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        // Specular lighting calculations\x0d\x0a        // Usually in these you see an \"eyeDirection\" variable, but in view space that is our position\x0d\x0a        float specularScale = clamp( dot( normalize( position_v ), reflect( lightDir_v, normal_v ) ), 0, 1 );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        vec3 diffuse = ( diffuseScale * light.color ) * textureColor ;\x0d\x0a        // \"8\" is the reflectiveness\x0d\x0a        // textureColor.w is the shininess\x0d\x0a        // specularIntensity is the light's contribution\x0d\x0a        vec3 specular = ( pow( specularScale, 8 ) * light.color * specularIntensity);\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a        color = vec4((diffuse + specular ) * attenuation, 1.0f ) ;\x0d\x0a        //color = vec4( vec3(1,0,0), 1.0f );\x0d\x0a\x0d\x0a    }\x0d\x0a"

members.name: SetResolution
members.originalType: void(int width, int height, ubyte depth = 0, bool fullscreen = false, ubyte samples = 1)
